effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.

flavor_text.sun_moon: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
